frontmatter.title: Breaking Reason of the Eccentric Shaft of Jaw Crusher
frontmatter.description: During daily production process, due to the overload operation of jaw crusher, the hardness of crushed material and the quality of toggle plate is not up to the standard, the eccentric shaft of jaw crusher is easy to be broken. In this text, the experts from Luoyang Dahua will tell you the reason.
